description: Core Parsing Engine - Zero-copy AST extraction with multi-language support using tree-sitter. Part of LeIndex Rust Renaissance master track.

performance_targets.parsing_speed: Parallel processing with rayon for 50K+ files
performance_targets.language_support: 17+ languages (Python, JS/TS, Go, Rust, Java, C++, C#, Ruby, PHP, Swift, Kotlin, Dart, Lua, Scala, Elixir, Haskell)
